short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assign your CRUD and FLS for Salesforce in Bulk from Single Screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension allows Salesforce Admins/Developers to assign CRUD and FLS Permissions from Single Screen. There are also features that provides ability to export permissions in CSV and also generate dashboard for the permissions.
